sense.def:
To loll somewhere
ali
to loll about
pomeni sedeti ali ležati v zelo sproščenem položaju.

seg.quote: The students lolled in the grass.

sense.def:
One's head or tongue lolls
rečemo, kadar nekomu glava ali jezik prosto visi.

seg.quote: ...feeling so sleepy, head lolling, eyes closing.
Her tongue lolled out, her eyes were rolled back.
